tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_management (
  organization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_capacity INT,
  waste_disposal_trend TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_trends (
  disposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_id INT,
  disposal_date DATE,
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  disposal_amount DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (landfill_id) REFERENCES landfill_capacity(landfill_id)
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_capacity (
  landfill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_name VARCHAR(255),
  capacity DECIMAL,
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal (
  disposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_id INT,
  disposal_date DATE,
  quantity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_id INT,
  year INT,
  trend_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_capacity (
  landfill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_name VARCHAR(50),
  capacity_in_tons INT,
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_trends (
  disposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_id INT,
  date DATE,
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  disposal_amount_in_tons INT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection (
  collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landfill_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  collected_waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  collected_amount_in_tons INT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  landfill_capacity_in_tons INT
)

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposal (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 landfill_id INT,
 disposal_date DATE,
 waste_type VARCHAR(50),
 volume DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE WasteMonitoring (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 landfill_id INT,
 monitoring_date DATE,
 waste_volume DECIMAL,
 temperature DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollection (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 landfill_id INT,
 collection_date DATE,
 waste_volume DECIMAL,
 collector_name VARCHAR(255)
);
